Install
```````


.. code:: bash

	`[sudo] pip install self`





Usage
`````


.. code:: python

	>>> from self import self

	>>> @self
		def method(self):



Examples
````````


.. code:: python

	>>> class CLS:
		@self
		def method(self):
			print("test")

		@self
		def method2(self):
			print("test")

	>>> CLS().method().method2() # jQuery like chain
